item.title: Smart Fill
item.description: Smart Fill # Smart Fill is an operator in the Draw mode. It fills an entire line art layer based on some color hints marked by the user. Compared with the Blender’s default Fill tool, it has the following advantages: It handles the gaps in the line art automatically. It is less likely to leave seams near the contour, or be intersected. Although the algorithms are different, the concept of this operation is similar to the Colorize Mask tool in Krita.
